ing: 1 pound peeled and deveined bay shrimp
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Small shrimp with simple seasoning. Add other seasonings if you like."
ins: Melt 6 tablespoons butter in a skillet over high heat. Add shrimp; cook and stir until browned, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low. Season shrimp with 1 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, garlic salt, salt, and pepper; cook for 1 minute. Serve with remaining 2 tablespoons butter and 1 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice.
